response.overview: Sean, is a lonely old man who continuously visits the "Orb Of Night", a place in the near-future where men pay to cuddle with beautiful sleeping women. In his stay, he waits with desire for the moon to go down so he can contemplate the subtle young beauty of his new companion Runa. Each night, Sean will get more obsessed and intimate with the young girl, until his love and desires for her will make him break the rules of the place in hope of something more.
response.title: Orb of Night
